## **What Are My (Short-Term) Future Goals?**

My short-term goal is to make money and save it. I want to start working by cutting lawns so that I can save money to accomplish my long-term goals.

## **What Are My (Long-Term) Future Goals?**

My long-term goals are:

1. to use my saved money to buy a mansion for my family.
2. to go to college so that I can become a scientist.
3. to be a scientist and work with numbers.

## **How Will I Achieve These Goals?**

I will achieve these goals by working hard and always asking questions. I will start saving money as soon as I can. I will go to college, and will study hard to get good grades.
